page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content: The fifteen square kilometer area is 90% reclaimed land.All the land lies below 8m and was reclaimed from the estuary of the Tees.The area south of the river was reclaimed first,during the last decade of the nineteenth century.Reclamation of the Seal sands area to the north of the river was undertaken by ICI and Monsanto since 1970 The area is almost all industrial providing work for over 1000 people yet no people live in the 15 square kilometer area.Access is limited and workers are conveyed mainly by private bus.Entry to every grid square except those in the south east is achieved by security pass.The general public does not have access unless by prior arrangement.
